name: Sports Car Racing
description:
Sports Car Racing is #1 stunning mobile racing game that puts you into the seat of your favorite luxury super sports cars! Designed for spirited performance and nimble handling, sports cars are your best speed machines to conquer the street and sky!

Launch yourself between chaos, drive or drift as you hit the pedal and roll into sports car culture now. Pickup your dream super cars, steer onto the streets driving reckless and juiced as sparks fly, never back down as you race anyone crazy enough to take you on! The tilt-to-turn handles perfectly, and the surge of acceleration is beyond satisfying. Its’ so immersive that you would wonder why weren’t conducting TV interviews after each race!

Game Features:
- 18+ all new fast & furious super sports cars
- Stunning 3D graphics, realistic physics, real cars and real city tracks
- Experience super sports car with simple yet deep car handling model
- Feel the thrill of gravity defying racing across 80+ challenging levels
- Custom and upgrade your rides with a wide range of paint, rims, brake calipers and interior trims
